original_text: Then came Eliakim the son of Hilkiah, which was over the household, and Shebna the scribe, and Joah the son of Asaph the recorder, to Hezekiah with their clothes rent, and told him the words of Rabshakeh.
korean_text: 이에 힐기야의 아들로서 왕궁 내의 책임자인 엘리야김과 서기관 셉나와 아삽의 아들 사관 요아가 옷을 찢고 히스기야에게 나아가서 랍사게의 말을 전하니라

sentences.original_text: Then came Eliakim son of Hilkiah
and Joah son of Asaph the recorder
to Hezekiah with their clothes rent
and told him words of Rabshakeh
